name: Squish The Zombies - Fun Time Killer Game with snowball
name_original: Squish The Zombies - Fun Time Killer Game with snowball
description:
Squish The Zombies is now universal!
and now fully supports retina display!

Squish The Zombies was featured at "New & Noteworthy"

Can you squish 400 zombies in one minute?
Be snowball! Squish the zombies!

Developer of Infect Them All presents another addicting game.

Gameplay is extremely simple!
Just tilt your device to move snowball and squish the zombies!
At times, you can even stomp buildings with snowball jump attack.

** Critics says **

"this game is pretty fun for a buck and to kill some spare time."
- appadvice.com

"It is perfect game for when you have a few minutes to burn. Just be careful not to get addicted to Blitz.”
- theportablegamer.com

"Why not find out in this super addictive game from the developers of Infect Them All?"
- cultofmac.com

Feature:
- Universal App.
- Fully support retina display.
- Simple and addictive gameplay.
- Easy Control.
- Doesn't stop device's music.
- 3 game modes
- Arcade : Squish the zombies, avoid other obstacles.
- Blitz : No obstacles many zombies!, One minute mass squishing fun.
- Quota : Try squish zombies to proceed next Level.
- Wide Arcade : Squish zombies at wide field!
- Game Center highscore and achievement.
- Twitter / Facebook publishing.

You can check out a video of gameplay at
http://bit.ly/stzvideo

More Game
- Infect Them All 2
- Toast The Chicken
- Bullfighting Hero
